amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds to implement Department of Defense (DOD) Directive 4715.21 on Climate Change Adaption and Resilience which requires the Pentagon to prioritize climate change over national security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit funds to implement Department of Defense (DOD) Directive 4715.21 on Climate Change Adaption and Resilience, requiring the Pentagon to prioritize climate change over national security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 205 (Roll no. 314).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 205 (Roll no. 314).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Buck.
